mahaththaya waradawa watahaganna epa.oyata waradi kiyanawa neweyi.oyage hrudasakkiya dannawane aththa mokadda kiyala.meke inna kawuruth ookata ahuwenna.waradda thiyenne pare yana ewunuth samajika karanna yana ekane.eekane poynt ganna thiyana lesima krame neda?minihek mahansiyen hambakarana salli boru karala kadaganna ewunge lamayintawath hariyan na.oowaye udama inna un pinanna salli hambakaranawa.kochchara karakawala kiwuwath ooka piramida thama.
thuwalayak sidu wu sthanayaka rudhiraya ha thuwala wu saila yana dewargayama pawathina nisa ee awata katales ensayimayada bahulawa pawathi.
ohu yannata perathuwa niwase siyallantama kiya gena giye niwasa bala gannalesataya.sami mahaththaya enathuru bala sitiyeya.ohu waththa siyalla sudda kaleya.anathuruwa malunta kama da dunneya.

mahabanku adhipathiwaraya nisi paridi kriya nokarana bawath, mahabankuwa sambandhayen ohuge palanaya gilihi athi bawath, ehi prathipalayak washayen aarthikaya wegayen pahalata ada watena bawath mahabankuwa thawamath palanaya wanne siya henchayiyan haraha ajith niwang kabral wisin bawath amathiwarun gananawak agramathyawarayata pawasa thibe.
siya mathi amathiwarunge nopanathkam saha mathpan nisa raju wadath raudra swarupayak ganna athara thamanta erehi wu ahalepolage birinda saha daruwan mara damima ehi kada ima sanituhan kale ya.

dolar miliyana kihipayak wenuwen hambanthota waraya chinayata badu dun aanduwa in nonawathi idam, dupath, thel tanki athulu watina sampath widesha samagamwalata badu dimata ho wikuna damimata katayuthu karamin sitinne me anuwaya.

hayidrajan ha nayitrajan wayu samaga dahanaya kalada prathikriya nokarana namuth boron, kaban,posparas,aasanik ha salfar samaga prathikriya karana mema muladrawyaya samanya ushnathwayedi akabanika amla samaga da semin prathikriya karayi.
